Welcome Student Veterans and Military-Connected Students!


 





Don't forget classes need to be certified before every semester!


Refer to HOW-TO GUIDE
 for detailed instructions to certify classes. For additional information regarding benefits visit our FAQ page. 
 


Center hours



Main Lobby
Student Lounge


Monday - Friday: 8am - 5pm
Monday - Thursday: 8am - 7pm


*Hours are subject to change*
Friday: 8am - 5pm



 
Our center is open during Winter, Spring, and Summer Breaks. Please call to inquire about hour adjustments during this time. 





Where to find us?
Location: GH(Gordan Hall)244
How to Contact Us?
Email: veterans@fullerton.edu

Phone: 657-278-8660




Center Amenities

- Come in and print documents that you need for class!- We have a quiet space for you to decompress and nap. - Our center has desktops and loaner laptops for you to use. - The student lounge is open everyday to be a place to study and meet other military connected students. - Ask our front desk about booking the conference room for your next group study session. - Free coffee and popcorn everyday!


			This page uses Ajax which rely on javascript.  You do not have javascript enabled, some functions will be disabled.

Web Accessibility

			CSUF is committed to ensuring equal accessibility to our users.  Let us know about any accessibility problems you encounter using this website.
			We'll do our best to improve things and get you the information you need.
